page.title: 04A GRANDMOTHER'S MORNING
page.content: Our day starts a 7.15am when we are awakened by the clock radio alarm, electric with battery back up, in case of power cuts during the night. While my husband showers and prepares for work I make the tea with tea bags, much cleaner then the tea leaves.After my husband has left for work I shower and dress.I sort the laundry and put it in the automatic washing machine,select the programme and the machine will do the rest.I decide what to cook for our evening meal, and take the meat out of the freezer to thaw out.Vacuuming the carpets comes next.Dusting is the same old monotonous job; so is cleaning the bathroom.11am :time to take my turn on the meals-on-wheels rota.Two people collect the dinners in a large charcoal heated container,and deliver them to the elderly people.
